snippet: Wladimir Klitschko retained his W.B.A. and I.B.F. heavyweight titles by unanimously outpointing the previously undefeated Alexander Povetkin in Moscow.
abstract: Wladimir Klitschko retains his WBA and IBF heavyweight boxing titles by unanimously outpointing the previously undefeated Alexander Povetkin in Moscow.
lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko retained his W.B.A. and I.B.F. heavyweight titles by unanimously outpointing the previously undefeated Alexander Povetkin in Moscow.
